title: Mailvox: parties and pork products
author: VD
content_html:
“Sally” seems to really enjoy the concept, having used the phrase thrice now:

Vox its nice to see you joined the sausage party! Oh..I thought you meant look up because you posted Jeremy’s email and responded. Can’t play with the big boy’s can you? The small guys usually get hurt.

It seems “she” doesn’t know how to hit reload on “her” browser. I’d originally been under the impression that “Sally” was a woman, but I stand corrected as it appears these two “big boy’s” must have been married in Massachusetts.
content_text:
“Sally” seems to really enjoy the concept, having used the phrase thrice now:
Vox its nice to see you joined the sausage party!  Oh..I thought you meant look up because you posted Jeremy’s email and responded. Can’t play with the big boy’s can you? The small guys usually get hurt.
It seems “she” doesn’t know how to hit reload on “her” browser.  I’d originally been under the impression that “Sally” was a woman, but I stand corrected as it appears these two “big boy’s” must have been married in Massachusetts.
